Title: Makes it unlawful for any commercial operator of a motor vehicle to transport loose substances in an open vehicle without proper restraints
Summary: Makes it unlawful for any commercial operator of a motor vehicle to transport loose substances in an open vehicle without the use of a proper restraint mechanism, as approved by the commissioner of motor vehicles.
LawCode: Amd ยง380-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the transportation of loose substances in open vehicles
